name: The Scruffs 2: Return of the Duke
name_original: The Scruffs 2: Return of the Duke
description:
The Scruffs 2: Return of the Duke is a puzzle game developed by Sweet Tooth Games. It came out on 08-07-2013. It was published by Avanquest Software.
You can play The Scruffs 2: Return of the Duke on PC.
